title: A Flower on the Back of His Head - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Cold Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Office Romance   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't   Short Story
author: Xī Zǐxù   西子绪
description:
Short and sweet story. The employee can see a little flower on his boss's head that describe the boss's mood. When the boss is happy, the flower bloomed and shines. When the boss is in bad mood the flower withered. Why is he the only one who could see the little flower on his boss's head? 

Boss X Employee>
